unnormalised: The IT dept. just sent out a reminder about linking your PAN card to your Aadhaar! Deadline's fast approaching on 30/06/2024, so don't dilly-dally! It's a must, bhai, or your PAN could become invalid. Plus, businesses need to ensure their GSTIN is updated and correct to avoid any tax troubles.
normalised: The I-T department just sent out a reminder about linking your P-A-N card to your Aadhaar! unnormalised: Speaking of businesses, the MCA's been cracking down on companies with inactive DINs (Director Identification Numbers).
